short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to leverage Hashicorp Vault as Credential Storage for teams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Think of it like Keepass for Teams where all your secrets are safely stored in Vault.

To use this exention you will need to have a running Vault instance.
